sentence.Network_en: He told the children to start moving clockwise around the room.
sentence.Network_cn: 他让孩子们开始按顺时针方向绕着房间走。

sentence.Network_en: Rotate the head clockwise and counterclockwise.
sentence.Network_cn: 按顺时针方向转动头部，然后再逆时针旋转。

sentence.Network_en: The dance moves in a counter-clockwise direction.
sentence.Network_cn: 这支舞是按逆时针方向跳的。

entry.def: When something is moving clockwise, it is moving in a circle in the same direction as the hands on a clock.

example.ex: He told the children to start moving clockwise around the room.
example.tran: 他让孩子们开始按顺时针方向绕着房间走。

means.word_mean: 1. in the same direction as the rotating hands of a clock
1. in the direction that the hands of a clock move;
